meanings.definition: A vehicle towed behind another vehicle for transporting goods or people.
meanings.sent1: The trailer carried furniture to the new house.
meanings.sent2: The truck pulled the trailer filled with camping gear.
meanings.sent3: The trailer followed the car like a loyal companion.
meanings.sent4: The trailer was a faithful helper on the road trip.
meanings.sent5: The shiny trailer gleamed in the sunlight as it traveled.

meanings.definition: A short promotional video or advertisement for a movie or TV show.
meanings.sent1: The trailer for the new action movie was exciting.
meanings.sent2: I watched the trailer for the upcoming comedy series.
meanings.sent3: The trailer made everyone laugh with its funny scenes.
meanings.sent4: The trailer teased viewers with snippets of the film.
meanings.sent5: The trailer captured the essence of the movie in just a few minutes.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that trails behind or follows another.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was the trailer in the game of tag.
meanings.sent2: The dog acted as a loyal trailer to its owner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel became the trailer in the chase.
meanings.sent4: The falling leaves were like nature's trailers behind the wind.
meanings.sent5: The slow-moving snail was the trailer in the race.
